titles.title: Homeless Prevention Permanent Housing Renewal Act of 2001

To amend the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act to provide for renewals of grants for permanent housing under the supportive housing program and for shelter plus care assistance to be funded through section 8 rental assistance amounts made available under the Housing Certificate Fund of the Department of Housing and Urban Development.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

bill.summary: 3/6/2001--Introduced. Homeless Prevention Permanent Housing Renewal Act of 2001 - Amends the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act to authorize appropriations for grants for permanent housing for homeless persons with disabilities and for shelter plus care, to be funded through section 8 rental assistance under the Department of Housing and Urban Development's Housing Certificate Fund.
